_metadata.note: Arrr! A swashbucklin' language fer seafarin' scallywags!

messages.setup_required_text:
Game coordinates ain't charted yet, cap'n.
Please enter yer bearings.
messages.game_dir_required: Game port directory be required, arrr.
messages.game_dir_invalid: Game port directory be invalid, ye scurvy dog.
messages.game_dir_not_detected: Can't spot th' Mewgenics port from here.
messages.exe_not_found: Mewgenics.exe not spotted in th' selected port.
messages.launch_failed:
Failed to set sail with Mewgenics:
{error}
messages.permission_denied_modlist:
Access denied: Can't write to th' ship's log.
Make sure th' hold has proper access.
messages.proton_warning_text:
Ye be runnin' on Linux with a Windows .exe (Proton).

Mods outside th' game bay may not work proper-like.
'Tis recommended to keep mods in th' game hold on Linux/Steam Deck.

Sail on anyway?
messages.no_mods_text: No mods be aboard. Recruit some crew first.
messages.launch_options_instructions:
Copy these launch orders and paste 'em in Steam:
Right-click game → Properties → Launch Options

Note: On Linux/Proton/Steam Deck, keep mods in th' game bay fer best sailin'.
